means: 奥斯德立兹（捷克斯洛伐克中部一城市，拿破仑于1805年在此击溃俄奥联军）

sentence.Network_en: On December 2, he smashed the Austrain and Russian armies at Austerlitz.
sentence.Network_cn: 12月2日, 他在奥斯特利茨击溃了奥国和俄国的军队.

sentence.Network_en: Napoleonic Wars: Battle of Austerlitz - French troops under Napoleon defeat a joint Russo - Austrian force.
sentence.Network_cn: 1805年拿破仑战争: 奥斯德立兹战役--拿破仑的法国军击溃了俄奥联军.

means.word_mean: 1. a town in Czech Republic; site of the Battle of Austerlitz in 1805
2. a decisive battle during the Napoleonic campaigns (1805); the French under Napoleon defeated the Russian armies of Czar Alexander I and the Austrian armies of Emperor Francis II

auth_sentence.content: Two hundred years ago Napoleon Bonaparte defeated a joint Russian and Austrian army at Austerlitz, now Slavkov in South Moravia.
